mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.partner_trade_no AS "partnerTradeNo", a.mch_appid AS "mchAppid", a.mchid AS "mchid", a.re_openid AS "reOpenid", a.payment_no AS "paymentNo", a.return_code AS "returnCode", a.result_code AS "resultCode", a.return_msg AS "returnMsg", a.err_code AS "errCode", a.err_code_des AS "errCodeDes", a.payment_time AS "paymentTime", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_wx_company_pay_record a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wx_company_pay_record( id, partner_trade_no, mch_appid, mchid, re_openid, payment_no, return_code, result_code, return_msg, err_code, err_code_des, payment_time, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{partnerTradeNo}, #{mchAppid}, #{mchid}, #{reOpenid}, #{paymentNo}, #{returnCode}, #{resultCode}, #{returnMsg}, #{errCode}, #{errCodeDes}, #{paymentTime}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wx_company_pay_record SET partner_trade_no = #{partnerTradeNo}, mch_appid = #{mchAppid}, mchid = #{mchid}, re_openid = #{reOpenid}, payment_no = #{paymentNo}, return_code = #{returnCode}, result_code = #{resultCode}, return_msg = #{returnMsg}, err_code = #{errCode}, err_code_des = #{errCodeDes}, payment_time = #{paymentTime}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
